gen:link.msg:message: `AgreedPaymentsDueToTermination` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IndividualMaximumPaymentDueToTerminationOfTheEmployment` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU5_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU5_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PaymentsDueToTerminationOfTheEmploymentIncludingUnduePayments` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU6_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU6_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PaymentsMadeInTheFinancialYearDueToTerminationOfTheEmployment` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU7_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU7_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`PositionOrPositions` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReasonsForExceedingMaximumAmountOfRemuneration` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` groter is dan 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivableUnduePaymentsExplanation` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `UnduePayments` groter is dan 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialTerminationOfEmploymentAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MOET groter of gelijk zijn dan 0.025. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericGEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericGEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE` MOET kleiner of gelijk zijn dan 1.000. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericLEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST1NumericLEConstant1_ScopeOfTheEmploymentDuringTheFinancialYearInFTE return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
